explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of artificial intelligence (AI) and deep learning techniques for forecasting stock market prices, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of deep learning techniques, specifically a convolutional neural network (CNN) combined with long short-term memory (LSTM), for forecasting stock market prices.
explanations.neural network: The proposed method involves neural networks, specifically CNN and LSTM, which are types of neural networks used for the forecasting task.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper proposes a method that uses a convolutional neural network (CNN) as part of the forecasting model.
explanations.CNN: The paper uses a convolutional neural network (CNN) in combination with LSTM for stock market forecasting.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper uses long short-term memory (LSTM) networks as part of the proposed forecasting model.
explanations.LSTM: The paper employs LSTM networks in conjunction with CNN for time series forecasting of stock market prices.
explanations.representation learning: The use of deep learning models like CNN and LSTM inherently involves representation learning, as these models learn hierarchical representations of the input data.
